then.line: I found...this.
Whoa. This looks ancient.
Yeah, well maybe we would've had a better selection at Paperclips!
Plus: it's really going to stand out! Ye Olde Minty has gone Ye Olde Missing!
Hm. I just hope this stuff holds up in the photocopier!
Anyhow, we'll work with what we've got...I guess.
Perfect!
What?
It looks like it's supposed to be read by a town crier. Or like it contains a spell.
... Are you gonna be stuck on this?
No. No, it's fine. Let's move on to the message. What do you want to write on it?
Well... I... found this?
Is that... an old sandwich wrapper?
Yep! From our very own Doc Sandwich! Doc Sandwich: Eat!
I love that slogan.
But I'm not sure I love the wrapper. It's...kinda greasy.
Hmmm...
Maybe the grease will catch the light? And the spots will really make it stand out!
...I don't know...
Well this would have been a lot easier if we just went to Paperclips!
Okay, okay. We'll use it. But what do you want to write on it?
Besto! Check out this paper I found. Feel how smooth it is!
Oh wow... This is really good stuff.
Yeah I kinda just want to keep touching it.
Same. Is this ASMR?
Uh, if you mean "A Sure-fire Minty Rescuer!" then yeah, it's definitely ASMR.
Hm. I didn't NOT mean that.
Anyway, I dig it. Great paper to find a great dog.
But the real question is: what do you want to write on it?
